Package com.refinedmods.refinedstorage.api.network.item

Interface INetworkItemProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
NetworkItem, WirelessCraftingMonitorItem, WirelessFluidGridItem, WirelessGridItem
public interface INetworkItemProvider
Provider for network items, implement this on the item.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    INetworkItem
    provide(INetworkItemManager handler, net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack stack, PlayerSlot slot)
    Creates a network item for the given item stack.

  • Method Details

    • provide

      @Nonnull INetworkItem provide(INetworkItemManager handler, net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player, net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack stack, PlayerSlot slot)
      Creates a network item for the given item stack.
      Parameters:
      handler - the network item handler
      player - the player
      stack - the stack
      slot - the slot in the players inventory or curio slot, otherwise -1
      Returns:
      the network item
